translation.es: No rayen mi barco con sus armas. Me costó mil millones de manat.

translation.en: When I pop this, the magnet pulse lasts for 15 seconds.
translation.es: Cuando active esto, el pulso magnético durará 15 segundos.

translation.en: Welcome to the world's biggest magnet.
translation.es: Bienvenidos al imán más grande del mundo.

translation.en: I was thinking that when this is over, I want you to meet my mother, yes?
translation.es: Cuando esto termine, quiero que conozcas a mi madre, ¿sí?

translation.en: Oh, God. You didn't say that.
I found the back doors to Rovach's suite.
- The chip fell out! - Well, fix it.
I can't just fix it, all right? The phone is very fucking complicated.
translation.es: No puedo, ¿sí? El teléfono es muy complicado.

translation.en: No. No, no, no, no. No, no. Go. Go, go, go.
- Sir, please, we must leave right now. - Hungry. I went for a dip.
translation.es: -Señor, debemos irnos ahora. -Tengo hambre. Fui a nadar.

translation.en: - I'm important guest. - We have to--
I just went for a dip, all right?
- Show me your hands. - This couscous?
I would love to meet your mother.
translation.es: Me encantaría conocer a tu madre.

translation.en: - What the fuck? - Put the phone down, and use your gun.
translation.es: - ¿Qué diablos? - Deja el teléfono y usa tu arma.

translation.en: I got it, I got it! I got it!
Holy shit! I mean, I wasn't sure it would work.
I mean, I wasn't sure sure. I had a suspicion, but I, uh...
translation.es: No estaba seguro. Lo sospechaba, pero…

translation.en: God, this is all so fucking dangerous.
Hey, hey! You like that phone now, motherfucker?
translation.es: Oye. ¿Ahora sí te gusta el teléfono?

translation.en: Stop fucking around. We gotta find Rovach.
Don't look at me. She's the evil one.
translation.es: No me mires. Ella es la malvada.

translation.en: - You did this? - Yeah. - Why? - If we don't move quick,
- they're gonna pull them from the boat. - You're sick.
translation.es: De prisa, o lo sacarán del barco. Estás enferma.
- ¡El barco se mueve! - Eso es malo.

translation.en: - Magnet! Where is the magnet? - They're getting their guns!
Shit. They got our position. We need to move.
translation.es: Mierda. Tienen nuestra posición. Debemos movernos.

translation.en: Honestly, I didn't think we'd make it this far.
translation.es: No creí que llegaríamos tan lejos.

translation.en: Five, find Rovach. I'll distract the guards.
translation.es: Cinco, ve por Rovach. Yo los distraigo.

translation.en: I've got four guys on me. I'm on the upper deck, and I'm screwed.
translation.es: Tengo a cuatro encima en la cubierta superior y estoy jodido.

translation.en: Come on! Oh, no.Wait. Wait. I got it.
- - I almost shot you right in the head.
translation.es: Casi te disparo en la cabeza.

translation.en: Goddamn it. You go eat some food.

translation.es: Estoy en el camarote de Rovach.

translation.en: - Get me to the rescue boat. - One.
Rovach is leaving with a guard.
translation.es: Uno, Rovach se va con un guardia.

translation.en: What do you want me to do?
Get me out of this boat.
What's your 20? Anybody got eyes on the target?
I don't know my 20. Stay off the channel. I'm going for Four.
translation.es: - No sé. ¡Sal de este cana!. - Voy por Cuatro.

translation.en: - Four, where you at, buddy? - You're breaking your own rules.
translation.es: - Cuatro, ¿dónde estás? - Estás rompiendo tus reglas.

translation.en: I thought you didn't have a family.
It's a big ship. Say something, pal.
translation.es: Es un barco grande. Dime algo.

translation.en: Look, Bond, you gotta get here fast.
It's a TV show. Come on, let's go.
translation.es: Es un programa de televisión. Vamos.

translation.en: As fast as she can fly to the villa in Dezar.
translation.es: Vuela tan rápido como puedas a la villa en Dezar.

translation.en: I was thinking of somewhere else.
translation.es: Estaba pensando en ir a otro lado.

translation.en: - Hey. - I'll blow your fucking head off!
In Turgistan, we're witnessing a regime change.
translation.es: En Turquestán, estamos viendo un cambio de régimen.

translation.en: We're following a major breaking story.  Country's overthrown...
translation.es: - Seguimos una gran noticia. - Han derrocado el país…

translation.en: Countries around the world are now mobilizing to give them help.
translation.es: Países de todo el mundo se movilizan para ayudarlos.

translation.en: Refugee camps are emptying. It's an amazing sight to see.
translation.es: Los campos de refugiados se vacían. Es increíble verlo.

translation.en: We're following a major breaking story.
We understand now that they're dropping Rovach off to rebels.
translation.es: Entendemos que le entregarán a Rovach a los rebeldes.

translation.en: - Welcome to Act Five. - I knew it.
translation.es: - Bienvenido al quinto acto. - Lo sabía.

translation.en: You didn't listen to me, Brother.
I have no idea what happens when you die.
translation.es: No tengo idea de qué pasa cuando mueres.

translation.en: Oh, we can do some shit...
They say that your soul departs when you pass.
translation.es: Dicen que tu alma se va cuando mueres.

translation.en: Well, for us, it was the opposite.
translation.es: Para nosotros, fue todo lo contrario.
El momento en que nada que perder…

translation.en: I am one... but not done.
translation.es: Soy Uno, pero no he terminado.

translation.en: Next time, can we just knock off a fucking casino?
translation.es: La próxima vez, ¿podemos robar un maldito casino?
